title: American Airlines Pilot Confirms 'Disturbing' UFO Sightings and Drones Threatening Planes in Viral Cockpit Confession
description: An American Airlines pilot reveals disturbing details about drones and UFO sightings in a viral TikTok Q&A, highlighting growing dangers in the skies for commercial flights.

title: US Military UFO Footage Leaked Showing 'Instant Acceleration' as Reaper Drone Locks On
description: Leaked US military footage filmed by a Reaper drone shows a UFO displaying instant acceleration, confirmed as UAP by intelligence analysts.

title: UFO Drive’s Strategic Pivot Turns Luxembourg Car Rental Into Global Mobility Platform
description: Luxembourg-based mobility company UFO Drive has transformed from a niche electric car rental service into a global mobility technology platform, and co-founder Aidan McClean says the shift is paying off. When the company started, McClean says the goal was simple: delivering an “out of this world, customer experience,” he recalls. Over time, he and co-founder [...]

title: Trump Pushes Pentagon to Open UFO Sites as Lawmaker Hints at 'Craft and Bodies'
description: Trump reportedly supports Pentagon visits to UFO sites after a lawmaker claims materials, craft, and bodies may exist, intensifying the push for disclosure.

title: Eric Burlison Reveals UFO Too Big To Move—Could South Korea Hold Humanity's Secret?
description: Rep. Eric Burlison suggests a massive, immovable UFO may be hidden in South Korea, stirring debate about government secrecy over UAPs and global security.
